languages.text: {n}Обсидиановая гладь огромной плиты начинает бурлить, на ней появляется набор {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NoNecronKnowlege}загадочных символов{/d}, будто невидимый палец выдавливает их на черной поверхности. Их мерцание выглядит тревожно, как жадные вдохи угасающего мученика.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Обсидиановая гладь огромной плиты начинает бурлить, пока на ней не появляется набор загадочных символов — будто бы невидимый палец выдавливает их один за другим на черной поверхности. Вы не знаете что они означают, но их мерцание выглядит тревожно, как жадные вдохи угасающего мученика.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NoNecronKnowlege}mysterious symbols{/d} appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. They shimmer forebodingly, like a martyr gasping for air as life drains from them.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Обсидиановая гладь огромной плиты начинает бурлить, на ней появляется набор {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NoNecronKnowlege}загадочных символов{/d}, будто невидимый палец выдавливает их на черной поверхности. Их мерцание выглядит тревожно, как жадные вдохи угасающего мученика.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of mysterious symbols appears on it, as if pressed into its black surface by an invisible finger. They shimmer forebodingly, making you think of a martyr gasping for air as life drains from them.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La lisa obsidiana de la inmensa losa empieza a distorsionarse. Una serie de {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NoNecronKnowlege}símbolos misteriosos{/d} aparece en la superficie, como si los trazara un dedo invisible. Emiten un brillo siniestro, como un mártir intentando coger aire mientras muere.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NoNecronKnowlege}mysterious symbols{/d} appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. They shimmer forebodingly, like a martyr gasping for air as life drains from them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La lisa obsidiana de la inmensa losa empieza a distorsionarse. Una serie de símbolos misteriosos aparece en la superficie, como si los trazara un dedo invisible. Emiten un brillo siniestro, como un mártir intentando coger aire mientras muere.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La surface lisse de l'énorme dalle d'obsidienne se met à onduler. Un ensemble de {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NoNecronKnowlege}mystérieux symboles{/d} apparaît dessus, comme s'ils y avaient été dessinés par un doigt invisible. Leur vacillement funeste fait penser à un martyr en train de suffoquer alors que la vie lui échappe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NoNecronKnowlege}mysterious symbols{/d} appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. They shimmer forebodingly, like a martyr gasping for air as life drains from them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La surface lisse de l'énorme dalle d'obsidienne se met à onduler. Un ensemble de mystérieux symboles apparaît dessus, comme s'ils y avaient été dessinés par un doigt invisible. Leur vacillement funeste fait penser à un martyr en train de suffoquer alors que la vie lui échappe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}黒曜石のように滑らかな巨大な平板が、さざ波立ち乱れ始める。一連の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NoNecronKnowlege}不思議なシンボル{/d}が、まるで見えざる手で刻印されたかのように黒い表面に現れる。シンボルは、まるで生命を吸われ、空気を求めてあえぐ殉教者のように不吉に揺らめいている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NoNecronKnowlege}mysterious symbols{/d} appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. They shimmer forebodingly, like a martyr gasping for air as life drains from them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}黒曜石のように滑らかな巨大な平板が、さざ波立ち乱れ始める。一連の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NoNecronKnowlege}不思議なシンボル{/d}が、まるで見えざる手で刻印されたかのように黒い表面に現れる。シンボルは、まるで生命を吸われ、空気を求めてあえぐ殉教者のように不吉に揺らめいている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}巨大金属板黑曜石般的光滑表面泛起了涟漪，一组{d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NoNecronKnowlege}神秘的符号{/d}浮现其上，仿佛是被某个看不见的手指印上去的一般。这些符号闪烁着预示性的光芒，宛如无数殉道者喘着粗气，静静等待生命消散的时刻。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NoNecronKnowlege}mysterious symbols{/d} appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. They shimmer forebodingly, like a martyr gasping for air as life drains from them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}巨大金属板黑曜石般的光滑表面泛起了涟漪，一组神秘的符号浮现其上，仿佛是被某个看不见的手指印上去的一般。这些符号闪烁着预示性的光芒，宛如无数殉道者喘着粗气，静静等待生命消散的时刻。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der glatte Obsidian der enormen Tafel beginnt sich zu kräuseln, zu brodeln. Eine Reihe {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NoNecronKnowlege}mysteriöser Symbole{/d} erscheint darauf, wie von einem unsichtbaren Finger auf die schwarze Oberfläche geschrieben. Sie schimmern bedrohlich, wie ein Märtyrer, der nach Luft ringt, während das Leben aus seinem Körper entweicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NoNecronKnowlege}mysterious symbols{/d} appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. They shimmer forebodingly, like a martyr gasping for air as life drains from them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der glatte Obsidian der enormen Tafel beginnt sich zu kräuseln, zu brodeln. Eine Reihe mysteriöser Symbole erscheint darauf, wie von einem unsichtbaren Finger auf die schwarze Oberfläche geschrieben. Sie schimmern bedrohlich, wie ein Märtyrer, der nach Luft ringt, während das Leben aus seinem Körper entweicht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Devasa tabakanın obsidiyen pürüzsüzlüğü, dalgalanmaya ve titremeye başlıyor. Üzerinde bir dizi {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NoNecronKnowlege}gizemli sembol{/d} oluşuyor. Sanki görünmez bir parmak, siyah yüzeyde iz bırakıyor. Korkunç bir şekilde can veren veren bir şehidin hareketleri gibi uğursuzca titreşiyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NoNecronKnowlege}mysterious symbols{/d} appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. They shimmer forebodingly, like a martyr gasping for air as life drains from them.{/n}
